\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 41901}

\subsection*{Narcolepsy Destroyed}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Anonymous}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 25 mg & oral & Modafinil & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 110.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
Alertness but no attention. Just hyper in the settling days. But day time narcolepsy destroyed. Much better than amphetamines. But no improvement in cognition, as scattered as ever. Wondering if sulbutinamine will help instead\ldots
